details.title: Operational concept for multi-carrier broadband VHF communications
details.abstract: Operational air traffic management needs have led to the concept of the broadband VHF (B-VHF) aeronautical communications system. This explains the functional principles, architecture, and internal mechanisms of the B-YHF system, showing how it can be used to provide the existing aeronautical voice and data link communications services and a multitude of new data link services expected for the next decade or two.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
